name: Trick or Treat (asteroid)
description:
Trick or Treat is a Halloween-themed spin on the classic Bomberman game.

Collect as much candy as you can in 2 minutes while avoiding being bombed by your opponent.

Features:

  • Cute pixel art
  • Local multiplayer (2-player)
  • Competitive
  • Graveyard-themed map
  • Collect candy
  • Bomb opponent to pause them/cause them to drop their candy
  • Unpredictable/test your luck power-ups

Release date: 22/07/17

Platform: Windows

Price: Free

Hope you enjoy!
